techs.name: Efficient Woodcutting
techs.description: Gathering wood yields one extra wood.

techs.name: Improved Construction
techs.description: Houses cost half as much wood.

techs.name: Advanced Mining
techs.description: Increases stone gathering efficiency and yields.

techs.name: Agricultural Techniques
techs.description: Improves food production and crop yields.

techs.name: Metal Tools
techs.description: Workers are more efficient at all tasks.

techs.name: Improved Logistics
techs.description: Resources are shared more efficiently between colonies.

techs.name: Exploration Techniques
techs.description: People move faster and discover resources more efficiently.

techs.name: Food Preservation
techs.description: Food resources last longer and spoil less.

techs.name: Population Management
techs.description: Increases birth rates in suitable conditions.

techs.name: Stone Masonry
techs.description: Enables building with stone for more durable structures.
